verses.verse: Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was making <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>
(although <S%G2544><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> baptize, <S%G907><s%> but <S%G235><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>),
he left <S%G863><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> needed <S%G1163><s%> to pass <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Samaria. <S%G4540><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> he <S%G2064><s%> came to <S%G1519><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Sychar, <S%G4965><s%> near <S%G4139><s%> the parcel of ground <S%G5564><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G5207><s%> his <S%G846><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%>'s well <S%G4077><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> being tired <S%G2872><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his journey, <S%G3597><s%> sat <S%G2516><s%> down <S%G3779><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the well. <S%G4077><s%> It was <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

A woman <S%G1135><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to draw <S%G501><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a drink. <S%G4095><s%>"
For <S%G1063><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> had gone away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> food. <S%G5160><s%>

The Samaritan <S%G4542><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "How is it that <S%G4459><s%> you, <S%G4771><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> a drink <S%G4095><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> a Samaritan <S%G4542><s%> woman? <S%G1135><s%>" (For <S%G1063><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> have <S%G4798><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> dealings <S%G4798><s%> with Samaritans. <S%G4541><s%>)

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you knew <S%G1492><s%> the gift <S%G1431><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'Give me <S%G3427><s%> a <S%G302><s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%>' you <S%G4771><s%> <S%G99999><s%> would have asked <S%G154><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he would have given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>"

The woman <S%G1135><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3777><s%> to draw with, <S%G502><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the well <S%G5421><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> deep. <S%G901><s%> From where <S%G4159><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> have you <S%G2192><s%> that <S%G5204><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> water? <S%G5204><s%>

Are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the well, <S%G5421><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> <S%G1537><s%> of <S%G846><s%> it himself, <S%G846><s%> as did <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> children, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> livestock? <S%G2353><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> "Everyone who <S%G3956><s%> drinks <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> will thirst <S%G1372><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> drinks <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G302><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> will <S%G1519><s%> never <S%G165><s%> thirst <S%G1372><s%> again; <S%G235><s%> but the water <S%G5204><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> will become <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a well <S%G4077><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> springing up <S%G242><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>"

The woman <S%G1135><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> I don't <S%G3361><s%> get thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> all the way here <S%G1759><s%> to draw. <S%G501><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Go, <S%G5217><s%> call <S%G5455><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> here. <S%G1759><s%>"

The woman <S%G1135><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> husband. <S%G435><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "You <S%G2036><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> <S%G2036><s%> 'I have no <S%G3756><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%>'

for <S%G1063><s%> you have had <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> husbands; <S%G435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G2192><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> husband. <S%G435><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> you <S%G2046><s%> have said truly. <S%G227><s%>"
The woman <S%G1135><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Sir, <S%G2962><s%> I perceive <S%G2334><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

Our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> Jews say <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> people ought <S%G1163><s%> to worship. <S%G4352><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> me, <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> will <S%G4352><s%> you worship <S%G4352><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

You <S%G5210><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> that which you <S%G5210><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know. <S%G1492><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> that which we <S%G2249><s%> know; <S%G1492><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G4353><s%> true <S%G228><s%> worshippers <S%G4353><s%> will worship <S%G4352><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth, <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> to be his <S%G846><s%> worshippers. <S%G4352><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> is spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who worship <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>"

The woman <S%G1135><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Messiah <S%G3323><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%>" (he who is called <S%G3004><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>). "When <S%G3752><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> has come, <S%G2064><s%> he will declare <S%G312><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he, <S%G2980><s%> the one who speaks to you. <S%G4671><s%>"

At <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> this, <S%G5129><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came. <S%G2064><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was speaking <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> a woman; <S%G1135><s%> yet <S%G3305><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2212><s%> looking for? <S%G2228><s%>" or, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2980><s%> speak with <S%G3326><s%> her? <S%G846><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her <S%G846><s%> water pot, <S%G5201><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the people, <S%G444><s%>

"Come, <S%G1205><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> told <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I did. <S%G4160><s%> Can <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3385><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> be the Christ? <S%G5547><s%>"
They <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> the meanwhile, <S%G3342><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> urged <S%G2065><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> eat. <S%G5315><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> food <S%G1035><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know about. <S%G1492><s%>"

The disciples <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> another, <S%G3361><s%> "Has <S%G5342><s%> anyone <S%G240><s%> brought <S%G5342><s%> him <S%G846><s%> something to eat? <S%G5315><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "My <S%G1699><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of him who sent <S%G3992><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to accomplish <S%G5048><s%> his <S%G846><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>

Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G3754><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2076><s%> 'There are yet <S%G2089><s%> four months <S%G5072><s%> until <S%G2532><s%> the harvest? <S%G2326><s%>' <S%G2064><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> look at <S%G2300><s%> the fields, <S%G5561><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> harvest <S%G2326><s%> already. <S%G2235><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> who reaps <S%G2325><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> wages, <S%G3408><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gathers <S%G4863><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> he who sows <S%G4687><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who reaps <S%G2325><s%> may rejoice <S%G5463><s%> together. <S%G3674><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this the <S%G3056><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G243><s%> 'One <S%G2076><s%> sows, <S%G4687><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> reaps. <S%G2325><s%>'

I <S%G1473><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to reap <S%G2325><s%> that for which <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> haven't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2872><s%> labored. <S%G2872><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> have labored, <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> have entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> labor. <S%G2873><s%>"

From <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Samaritans <S%G4541><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of the woman, <S%G1135><s%> who testified, <S%G3754><s%> "He told <S%G2036><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I did. <S%G4160><s%>"

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the Samaritans <S%G4541><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they begged <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to stay <S%G3306><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> them. <S%G846><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> stayed <S%G3306><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of <S%G3056><s%> his <S%G846><s%> word. <S%G3056><s%>

They <S%G5037><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the woman, <S%G3754><s%> "Now <S%G3765><s%> we believe, <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3765><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of <S%G2981><s%> your <S%G4674><s%> speaking; <S%G2981><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> for ourselves, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> indeed <S%G230><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

After <S%G3326><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> from there <S%G1564><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> testified <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> country. <S%G3968><s%>
